file_content.text: Glad to see you both made it back okay.
That's the last time I let you go off without a chaperone.
Looks like I'm grounded.
She taking good care of you?
Always.
Welcome back, kid.
Blizz make this for Torian! It, um, not finished yet... boss save Torian superfast, but Blizz keep working!
Thanks.
Don't ever scare us like that again, jerk!
Sorry. Won't happen again.
We back on the hunt?
I think it's safe to proceed.
Yes.
We'll head out after a little R & R. I think it's deserved.
Not yet.
Seconded.
This is no excuse to slack off.
We've wasted enough time.
One of Tormen's lackeys forwarded a star chart to a system called Voss. The place isn't even on most maps yet.
There's a lot of scuttlebutt about Voss's discovery on the HoloNet, but it's pretty far-fetched stuff even for spacer superstition.
The astrogation computer's updated and ready to go when you are.
You've been a busy girl. Too busy. You should spend more time with your loved ones before they're gone.
You've been a busy boy. Too busy. You should spend more time with your loved ones before they're gone.
I'm extending you an invitation. An opportunity to appreciate what you have, before you lose it.
But if your little boyfriend isn't marriage material, we understand.
But if you Mando barbarians don't care much for your POWs, it's not any loss to us.
But if the boy's less close to you than we thought, it really doesn't matter.
There'll be plenty of other opportunities for us to meet.
If you want a chance to say goodbye, come to Hoth. We won't wait long.
Torian! We've got to save him!
He's not the one they're after.
They're bluffing.
Maybe not, but who knows what they'll do to get your attention.
Hate to say it, but she's got a point.
They so much as scuff his boots and they're dead.
Nobody touches my man.
If anyone can get him back safe, it's you.
You two getting close?
You seem awfully concerned.
Me and Torian? I guess. Don't look at me like that, we're just friends.
Is now really the best time to find your jealous streak? Torian needs our help.
Your boyfriend's gonna be just fine.
I'll get him back to you.
I can't lose anyone else... I just can't.
Nobody messes with my crew.
Someone will pay for this.
Mess with one of us, mess with all of us. Right?
Boss and Blizz beat up bad people real good!
Or at least humiliate them to death.
There's not exactly a lot of pay in "payback." I'm just saying.
That's exactly what they want.
This is a trap.
They seem to be smart; they won't toss their bait until they're sure we won't bite.
I know, but we have to do something!
So what are we going to do?
The deck's stacked against us. We need to be prepared for the worst.
This can't be rushed.
You're right, we've only got one shot at this. Just don't wait too long, okay?
We get Torian back.
Set a course for Hoth.
Right! Let's do this!
Blast these idiots.
I plan to make an example out of these scum bags.
You're finally sayin' something interestin'.
You and me both!
Everybody front and center.
Whoa, whoa, whoa... what's that creep doing here?
What's the matter, girlie? Scared?
The Houk's sticking around.
He'll be joining us.
Keep the squabbling to yourselves.
Quit messing around.
You didn't mention we had a guest.
Who's our large friend?
I never asked.
Actually, I don't know.
Three meters of short fuse that owes me.
Our new muscle.
Wait. Someone's missing.
Torian's usually punctual.
Maybe Torian in medbay, get holes fixed?
Ah, let the kid have an off-day. Better yet, wrap this up so I can get back to mine.
He told me he got a message from an old associate. They were going to meet at the cantina.
He can bring himself up to speed.
We'll move on then.
Out here? He tell you anything about this "old associate"?
I'll check in. [Call Torian]
Not really. You know Torian. You think this wasn't a friendly meeting?
It's hard to say without more details.
I think we need more intel.
I could probably dig up the message, if you think it's worth it.
He won't answer or can't answer; I don't like either.
It's definitely suspicious.
Should we head to the cantina?
Or too friendly.
Could be an old flame.
Or very friendly.
You--you think that's true?
No. And even if it was, Torian wouldn't be meeting her for--that.
Well... good, he's a sweetheart. He could use a girlfriend.
Why am I only hearing about this now?
I should have been told.
It didn't sound important. We need your say-so to have a life now?
We're a team. We communicate.
We should be working together.
I know, but I'm sure even you want some privacy now and again.
It's my responsibility to look out for my crew.
I'm just concerned.
Sorry, I was out of line.
I don't appreciate my boyfriend sneaking off without telling me.
No, but Torian does.
If this associate turns out to be another woman, he's dead.
There's no way he'd just run off for a fling! That's just not... Torian.
He wouldn't do that to you. I know he wouldn't.
I wouldn't go slipping off someplace unless you want me tracking you down.
My woman certainly does.
I can't believe you sometimes. Ugh!
You're startin' to bore me.
Who do you think you are?
You work for me, you're always on call. Got it?
Everybody here does as I say.
You work for me, you're always on call. Got it?
Everybody here does as I say.
I suggest everyone get acquainted.
Name's Skadge. Don't forget it.
Whatever, creep.
Can we get back to Torian now?
Yes.
See if you can find that message from Torian's old associate.
Name's Skadge.
Skadge. Okay. Interesting... call me Mako.
Skadge friend of boss. Skadge friend of Blizz.
This thing beggin' for a treat?
Skadge... don't you worry, I've got it committed to memory.
Torian.
Are we done?
Yes. Time to get to work.
Guess teamwork's too much to ask on day one.
One big happy family....
She gets this way now and again.
Don't mind her, Skadge.
So what's next?
Tormen still has a target for us to deal with.
We still have work to do.
I guess, find a place big enough for Skadge to bed down.
Get the Houk settled.
Don't know about you, but I plan to kick up my heels for awhile.
I'm taking a break.
